captions.text: were going to make some really awesome but really simple cookies using all the usual ingredients which
ill put into a bowl mix them together
and then our addition we are going to add some ready slated crisps finished with chocolate these are amazing what you doing
Jamie Oliver's spoons all have his name on them
help yourself to peanut butter because i know its your favorite meanwhile i'm going to start
with the butter and brown sugar
now as soon as you finish that your going to do this put the peanut butter down and start beating that
together to comes
nice and smooth and creamy
but we've only put half the normal amount of butter that you would for cookies becasue the other half
is crunchy peanut butter
so the stuff you haven't been eating its nice to have a bit of a change of scenery
thank god Jamie Oliver left his window opened otherwise we wouldn't be in
so as soon as that's combined the eggs are going in as well
you can already smell that amazing peanut butter  im also going to add a teaspoon of
vanilla extract
our self raising flour
and bring all that together
just slowly slowly
and more raising agent in the form of baking powder this is hard work i cant be bothered
you do it
now your not far off you have got a nice mix there

which is where we get to the most
amazing bit of these cookies
two bags of ready slated crisps
so its going to add crunch amazing saltiness all you need to do is roughly
crumble those into there
you have got some big bits and some small bits its all about texture salt the smoothness of the peanut butter
with this
crispy texture
its amazing
these are the cookies I had in Miami last year and i have been wanting to make them
ever since ill take it from here you do this bit
just grab a tray out
which we have already lined with baking parchment
right big dollops of our mix like so
i want to get about 6 on this tray
and the nuts these are monkey nuts they are raw peanuts still in their shell
all i need you to do is crack them open
so we end up with just nits and hopefully still with their nice little red husk on as well
great colour and what is really awesome is at this stage you can roll your stuff
into cling film or grease proof paper and put them in the fridge and you can always have cookie dough ready to go
and you can just take slice or pieces off
eat it or cook them fresh oh man that's delicious
lets do another one
lets get another close up
lets put some peanuts on top
five or six of those on
each cookie and that's it then they need to go into the oven
for twelve minutes at 180
degree Celsius
our cookies have baked off nice and golden we've let them cool and now we are going to do some chocolate on top
but to do that i'm going to make a quick piping bag just going to cut
triangles out
you do one and ill do the other so roll both corners up and
towards the middle triangle so you have got a nice point there and
seal it off
just by folding those down and then what you have got is a perfect cone to pipe
chocolate
almost like that okay you hold that
and we've got some chocolate here dark chocolate and all we've done is melt that down
over a bowl of simmering water we can pour that straight in there
like so lay it down and fold it over
so your sealing in that chocolate a tiny little cut off this end
we end up with something
we can pipe our cookies with
molten chocolate
because chocolate and peanut we know is a great combination again chocolate and salt works
because there is that popular brand of crisp
chocolate flavour crisp isn't there.  is there?
there we go beautiful
we have amazing
chocolate peanut
and ready slated crisp cookies just as we have finished our cookies we have been joined
by Jamie so someone to actually taste them for real tell us what you think.  Man this is good
i love having you guys here really nice and light
beautiful quite macarooney really nice
whats the secret ingredient
well you got peanut butter in there somewhere
peanuts peanut butter
its almost like you've got tiny hits of salted crisps in there like the salted caramel thing
there you go salted caramel salted chocolate we thought you were going to go peanut what a pallet
really good i mean the thing is
you wouldn't know notice it unless you
thought about it
but actually it just makes you taste it more
very very delicious i want the recipe awesome well if you want the recipe check out sortedfood.com
and otherwise for more recipes click on Jamie's face to subscribe to Jamie's
food tube just click now slap my face
you've been wanting to do it for years just slap it
